feed.title: Workout Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.13.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add code to auto-generate screenshots by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/107
  • Improve support for fit-files by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/108

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.13.0...v0.13.1

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.13.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add "Garmin" to the list of correct altitude creators by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/109

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.13.1...v0.13.2

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.13.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Disable animations in map and graphs and disable screenshot aniâ€¦ by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/110
  • Add more information to workout stats by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/111
  • Remove the "x" from the tooltip by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/113
  • Bump all go dependencies by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/112
  • Add details to the stats markers by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/114
  • Improve responsive design of workout breakdown by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/115

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.13.2...v0.13.3

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.13.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add support for submitting workouts via API by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/116
  • Allow admins to manage some application-wide settings by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/117
  • Detect workouts without any GPS points by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/119
  • Fix the graph async in the workout statistics by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/121
  • Show the totals/records for the selected user by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/122
  • Make the whole pill containing the username clickable by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/123

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.13.3...v0.13.4

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.14.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • added german translations by @bbbutch in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/124
  • Update npm packages by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/125
  • workout type golfing added by @bbbutch in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/126
  • Replace chart.js with apexcharts by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/128

New Contributors

  • @bbbutch made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/124

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.13.4...v0.14.0
